mapper.select: SELECT e.event_no, e.event_name, e.event_start, e.event_end, e.event_notice, et.img_no, et.system_name, et.origin_name, et.img_size, et.img_type, et.img_path FROM event e LEFT JOIN event_thumbnail et ON e.event_no = et.event_no WHERE e.event_end >= SYSDATE ORDER BY e.event_no DESC

SELECT e.event_no, e.event_name, e.event_start, e.event_end, e.event_notice, et.img_no, et.system_name, et.origin_name, et.img_size, et.img_type, et.img_path FROM event e LEFT JOIN event_thumbnail et ON e.event_no = et.event_no WHERE e.event_end < SYSDATE ORDER BY e.event_end DESC, e.event_no DESC

choose.when: SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/#{numberPerPage}) FROM event WHERE event_end >= SYSDATE
choose.otherwise: SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/#{numberPerPage}) FROM event WHERE event_end < SYSDATE
